google_project_iam_binding.description: Authoritative for a given role. Updates the IAM policy to grant a role to a list of members. Other roles within the IAM policy for the project are preserved.

google_project_iam_member.description: Non-authoritative. Updates the IAM policy to grant a role to a new member. Other members for the role for the project are preserved.

google_project_iam_policy.description: Authoritative. Sets the IAM policy for the project and replaces any existing policy already attached.
